                                                §
                  Appellee.
                                        OPINION

       Appellants Lucchese Boot Company, Lucchese, Inc., Jose Angel Velarde, and Jose Angel

Valadaz seek reversal of the trial court’s order denying its motion to compel arbitration against

former employee Hector Rodriguez. We reverse and remand.

                                       BACKGROUND

       In 2007, Rodriguez filed a non-subscriber negligence suit against Lucchese after

allegedly suffering work-related injuries. Lucchese initially sought to compel arbitration against
